column4: I keep getting a message saying Could not download all repository indexes how do i fix it
could you run    sudo apt-get update   in a terminal, and put the results on http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org
that looks like a mirror of ubuntu
there should have been an error code , like 404 or something as well
you should run     sudo apt-get update    in a terminal and put the results on http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org
how are you doing on getting that output, having any issues?
